column4: if i install wine on my machine, to which directory does it instaal itself? coz im confused by the Drive letter on wine, looks like on win
and, inside of there, you'll see ~/.wine/drive_c/  Which is wine's C drive.  It looks like windows, because the programs think they're running in windows
~ is your homedir, so you go there.  Its hidden though, so you'll need to hit ctrl-H to view hidden folders
